I can see where everyone is coming from.
Let's say that this is made for girls, which was the whole point of why Bakugou got into this whole ridiculous scenario (despite how it's kinda out of character and implausible on all sides)... why not go the whole nine yards by the end? You've got a scenario where a character is being made aware of him being a bottom, but they don't go full-frontal? They don't make him dress like a girl? They don't peg him while he's tearing up in his eyes, swearing up a storm as he he's forced to find a new purpose in life, in being a bottom? It's a weaksauce hentai that's part of a niche that's supposed to be as provocative as all get out. It's just "Here's some nippleplay, a dildo in your ass for no reason, and invisible molestation," and that's it.
What I'm saying is, this hentai could've done a much better job at being a hentai I have no interest in, but could be more interesting for its target niche.
I do need to point out though that it's awesome to see a bit of a boom of guy and girl action for MHA as of recently. Some aren't much or need translations, but they're great nonetheless.
Wow. Didn't know I'd be saying a public speech on a site where people are meant to Jack off...

For everyone trying to counteract our argument. You're effectively saying to a lot of us, we who have gone through all the good heterosexual doujinshi this awesome series provides (popular tab bless), that we can't get mad about the plethora of yaoi and stuff like this. Because "Aww,  this is for GIRLS, and there's SO much more straight porn on this site than just for MHA, you whinny BOYS." That's uncool and untrue. We're annoyed at the fact that ships in MHA take dominance over these doujinshi. Because EVERYONE loves gay ships, we're barely ever given guy and girl action, and us cis straight males are stuck with doujinshi we've read a dozen times now. This isn't about what other stuff is out there, but about MHA's doujinshi specifically. And some people, especially MHA fans, probably want to see Izuku and Uraraka fuck in a few more than what we got right?! But right now, cis male MHA fans are ostracised for their tastes, and you're telling us to, "deal with it, or fuck off?" STFU
